Package io.atomix.copycat.client

Provides classes for communicating with a Raft cluster and submitting commands and queries.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command<T>
    Base interface for operations that modify system state.
    ConnectionStrategy
    Connection strategies define how clients should handle initializing connections to the cluster.
    ConnectionStrategy.Attempt
    Represents a failed attempt at connecting to the server.
    CopycatClient
    Provides an interface for submitting commands and Query queries to the Copycat cluster.
    CopycatService
    Base interface for communicating with a Copycat cluster.
    Operation<T>
    Base type for Raft state operations.
    Query<T>
    Base interface for operations that read system state.
    RecoveryStrategy
    Strategy for recovering client sessions on failures.
    RetryStrategy
    Strategy for handling operation submission failures by a client.
    RetryStrategy.Attempt
    Operation attempt.
    ServerSelectionStrategy
    Strategy for selecting nodes to which to connect and submit operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CopycatClient.Builder
    Builds a new Copycat client.
    DefaultCopycatClient
    Default Copycat client implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Command.CompactionMode
    Constants for specifying command compaction modes.
    Command.ConsistencyLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft Command consistency levels.
    ConnectionStrategies
    Basic connection strategies.
    CopycatClient.State
    Indicates the state of the client's communication with the Copycat cluster.
    Query.ConsistencyLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft Query consistency levels.
    RecoveryStrategies
    Strategies for recovering lost client sessions.
    RetryStrategies
    Client operation retry strategies.
    ServerSelectionStrategies
    Strategies for managing how clients connect to and communicate with the cluster.

Package io.atomix.copycat.client Description

Provides classes for communicating with a Raft cluster and submitting commands and queries.
Author:
Jordan Halterman
